headline: Viridian Stock Flashes A Bullish Sign In Its Eye-Disease Battle With Amgen
summary: Viridian Therapeutics stock popped Monday after the company scored a win in thyroid eye disease, a condition that causes the eyes to swell.

headline: Upstream Bio: Treating Respiratory Disorders With TSLP Targeting Differentiation

headline: Battle Over Weight-Loss Drugs: Can Eli Lilly, Novo Nordisk Defend Their Turf?
